```{.r .cell-code}
#planilha GOOGLE - IMPORTAR 

library(gsheet)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stderr}
```
Warning: package 'gsheet' was built under R version 4.3.3
```
:::

```{.r .cell-code}
df4 <- gsheet2tbl("https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1bq2N19DcZdtax2fQW9OHSGMR0X2__Z9T/edit#gid=983033137")

 
  library(ggplot2)
  g1<- df4 |> 
  ggplot(aes(trat, comp)) +
    geom_boxplot(outlier.colour = NA)+
    geom_jitter(width = 0.05,
                color ="black",
                shape =2,
                size =3)+
    theme_classic() +
    labs(x = "tratamento",
         y = "Comprimento (mm)",
         title = "meu primeiro ggplot", 
         caption = "fonte: dados diversos")
  scale_y_continuous(limits = c (5,20),
                     n.breaks = 10)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}
```
<ScaleContinuousPosition>
 Range:  
 Limits:    5 --   20
```
:::

```{.r .cell-code}
  g1
```
